main event: A report from Mitchell AFB, New York detailing a UFO incident observed on January 21, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting involved a circular object approximately 20' to 30' in diameter,The object was observed at an altitude of over 6,000 feet,The reported motion included tight turns and locking or oscillating movements,The observer was a retired pilot,The sighting was reported at 0950 EST.
